DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1
Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set cant_fichas_abacom = 1
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_periodo = dbo.DevuelvePeriodo(Fecha_carga_ficha_abacom) where id_periodo is null
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_ficha = 0 where id_ficha is null update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_entidad = 0 where id_entidad is null
--- Declara el periodo, el mismo debe ser el maximo periodo produccion de AUX_h_abacom_pendiente
Declare @Periodo int Set @Periodo = (select MIN(id_periodo) from AUX_h_abacom_pendiente)
--- Actualizar campo de supervisor
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_asesor_superior_cascada_comercial = ca.id_asesor_superior_cascada_comercial, id_tipo_puesto_superior_cascada_comercial = ca.id_tipo_puesto_superior_cascada_comercial from AUX_h_abacom_pendiente tr inner join H_CASCADA_COMERCIAL ca on (tr.id_promotor = ca.id_asesor_cascada_comercial and tr.id_periodo = ca.id_periodo) where tr.id_periodo > = @Periodo
--- inicializo el gerente zonal
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_asesor_gerente_zonal = 0, id_tipo_puesto_gerente_zonal = 0 where id_periodo > = @Periodo
--- Me fijo si ese supervisor es Gerente Zonal y lo asigno a su campo
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_asesor_gerente_zonal = id_asesor_superior_cascada_comercial, id_tipo_puesto_gerente_zonal = id_tipo_puesto_superior_cascada_comercial, id_tipo_puesto_superior_cascada_comercial = 0, id_asesor_superior_cascada_comercial = 0 where id_tipo_puesto_superior_cascada_comercial = 5 and id_periodo > = @Periodo
--- Me fijo si ese supervisor es Asesor Lider y lo asigno a su campo
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_asesor_lider_cascada_comercial = id_asesor_superior_cascada_comercial, id_tipo_puesto_asesor_lider_cascada_comercial = id_tipo_puesto_superior_cascada_comercial, id_tipo_puesto_superior_cascada_comercial = 0, id_asesor_superior_cascada_comercial = 0 where id_tipo_puesto_superior_cascada_comercial = 2 and id_periodo > = @Periodo
--- Actualizar si es asesor lider su supervisor
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_asesor_superior_cascada_comercial = ca.id_asesor_superior_cascada_comercial, id_tipo_puesto_superior_cascada_comercial = ca.id_tipo_puesto_superior_cascada_comercial from AUX_h_abacom_pendiente tr inner join H_CASCADA_COMERCIAL ca on (tr.id_asesor_lider_cascada_comercial = ca.id_asesor_cascada_comercial and tr.id_periodo = ca.id_periodo) where tr.id_periodo > = @Periodo and id_tipo_puesto_asesor_lider_cascada_comercial = 2
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_supervisor = id_asesor_superior_cascada_comercial where id_periodo > = @Periodo and id_asesor_superior_cascada_comercial is not null
--- Actualizar campo de gerente zonal
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_asesor_gerente_zonal = ca.id_asesor_superior_cascada_comercial, id_tipo_puesto_gerente_zonal = ca.id_tipo_puesto_superior_cascada_comercial from AUX_h_abacom_pendiente tr inner join H_CASCADA_COMERCIAL ca on (tr.id_supervisor = ca.id_asesor_cascada_comercial and tr.id_periodo = ca.id_periodo) where tr.id_periodo > = @Periodo
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_gerente_zonal = gz.id_gerente_zonal from AUX_h_abacom_pendiente tr inner join D_GERENTE_ZONAL gz on (gz.id_asesor_cascada_comercial = tr.id_asesor_gerente_zonal) where id_periodo > = @Periodo
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_gerente_zonal = 99 where id_gerente_zonal is null and id_periodo > = @Periodo
--- Actualizar campo de gerente regional
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_asesor_gerente_regional = ca.id_asesor_superior_cascada_comercial, id_tipo_puesto_gerente_regional = ca.id_tipo_puesto_superior_cascada_comercial from AUX_h_abacom_pendiente tr inner join H_CASCADA_COMERCIAL ca on (tr.id_asesor_gerente_zonal = ca.id_asesor_cascada_comercial and tr.id_periodo = ca.id_periodo) where tr.id_periodo > = @Periodo
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_gerente_regional = gz.id_gerente_regional from AUX_h_abacom_pendiente tr inner join D_GERENTE_REGIONAL gz on (gz.id_asesor_cascada_comercial = tr.id_asesor_gerente_regional) where id_periodo > = @Periodo
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_gerente_regional = 99 where id_gerente_regional is null and id_periodo > = @Periodo
--- Casos especiales
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_supervisor = 510 where id_periodo > = @Periodo and id_asesor_superior_cascada_comercial = 0 and id_promotor = 513
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_supervisor = id_promotor, id_asesor_superior_cascada_Comercial = id_promotor, id_tipo_puesto_superior_cascada_comercial = 3 where id_promotor in (5004, 5042) and id_periodo > = @Periodo
--CALCULO DE CANT_CAPITAS_ABACOM SELECT id_ficha_abacom, count(*) as cantidadporficha into #tempfichas FROM HOST03.HOST03.ASOCIADO.FICHAS_PERSONAS inner join AUX_h_abacom_pendiente on FICHA_ID = id_ficha_abacom group by id_ficha_abacom
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set cant_capitas_abacom = cantidadporficha from AUX_h_abacom_pendiente h inner join #tempfichas t on t.id_ficha_abacom = h.id_ficha_abacom --Seteo en F/D update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set cant_capitas_abacom = 0 where cant_capitas_abacom is null
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_supervisor = 99999 where id_supervisor is null
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_asesor_superior_cascada_comercial = 99 where id_asesor_superior_cascada_comercial is null
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_tipo_puesto_superior_cascada_comercial = 0 where id_tipo_puesto_superior_cascada_comercial is null
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_tipo_puesto_gerente_regional = 0 where id_tipo_puesto_gerente_regional is null update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_tipo_puesto_asesor_lider_cascada_comercial = 0 where id_tipo_puesto_asesor_lider_cascada_comercial is null
update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_asesor_gerente_regional = 99 where id_asesor_gerente_regional is null update AUX_h_abacom_pendiente set id_asesor_lider_cascada_comercial = 99 where id_asesor_lider_cascada_comercial is null

component.contactInfo: OLE DB Destination;Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server; (C) Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;4
component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection

component.name: OLE DB Source

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

properties.property:
select fic.id, solicitud_numero, estado_ficha_ID, FECHA_CARGA,ENTIDAD_NUMERO , fic.PROMOTOR_ID, DNI,APELLIDO, NOMBRE, CP , FECHA_NAC, TEL, CEL, MAIL from ASOCIADO.FICHAS FIC INNER JOIN ASOCIADOS.POTENCIALES ON (FIC.ID = FICHA_ID) WHERE ELIMINADO = 'N' AND FIC.PROMOTOR_ID <> 2158
order by fic.id

property.description: The variable that contains the SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommandVariable

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: The mappings between the parameters in the SQL command and variables.
property.name: ParameterMapping

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection
